mapper.select: select ss.assignment_id as assignmentId, ss.user_id as userId, ss.score, ss.status, ss.created_at as createdAt, ss.updated_at as updatedAt from student_score ss inner join assignment a on a.id = ss.assignment_id where a.section_id =#{sectionId};
mapper.delete: delete from student_score where assignment_id = #{assignmentId} and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select ci.status = 0 from student_score ss inner join assignment a on a.id = ss.assignment_id::uuid inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = a.section_id::uuid inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id where ss.assignment_id = #{assignmentId} and ss.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: update student_score set score = #{score}, status = #{status} where assignment_id = #{assignmentId} and user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: insert into student_score (assignment_id, user_id, score, status) values (#{assignmentId}, #{userId}, #{score}, #{status});
